name: Explore Herts
description:
EXPLORE HERTS is a collaborative project between the University of Hertfordshire and developer Martin Jacob.


The game has you discover the University's campus, get a taste of life there, meet their students, and play a collection of minigames !

_____________________________________________

A game by Martin Jacob
https://twitter.com/jartin_macob

Graphics were made by Maxime Congy
https://www.artstation.com/guacamol

_____________________________________________

Huge thanks to Richard Wiseman for initiating the project !
https://twitter.com/RichardWiseman
